name: Sugar Shack
description: Sugar Shack is a moderate, indica-dominant hybrid. Great for nighttime or evening use, this strain provides users with a mild head and body-heavy sensation. Be careful, though, because too much Sugar Shack will put you right to sleep. If you’re looking to increase appetite, Sugar Shack is also a great strain to try. Like its name suggests, this strain features a slightly sweet taste and scent that verges on piney and herbal. A good strain for beginning cannabis users, Sugar Shack is mild yet gets the job done.
descriptionPlain: Sugar Shack is a moderate, indica-dominant hybrid. Great for nighttime or evening use, this strain provides users with a mild head and body-heavy sensation. Be careful, though, because too much Sugar Shack will put you right to sleep. If you’re looking to increase appetite, Sugar Shack is also a great strain to try. Like its name suggests, this strain features a slightly sweet taste and scent that verges on piney and herbal. A good strain for beginning cannabis users, Sugar Shack is mild yet gets the job done.

highlightedReviews.text:
Nice smoke, little bit piney but has a nice finish, lemony sweet. Blasted one in my bipper and sat down to dinner. My thinking was clear and elevated, my body felt good and warm. Its kind of a cross between couch glue and ambitiony where you'll make great plans to do something but also may not.

Sound and high stress might wig you out in a funny (not scary) way. My smoking buddy was eating ice cream and the door slammed due to wind and he thought it was a gunshot which led to all kinds of funny paranoia.

I paid 15$ for an 1/8th and worth every penny.

Lasts the standard 90 mins and the burnout is mellow and drives you back to it.

The strain was Great. Much less anxiety! This is the only dispensary I would go to because they really care and treat you with compassion. You are not just another customer. 
All the budtenders there are super nice, experienced & educated.
